name: Roo.form.Row
desc: Creates a row container for layout and rendering of fields in an {@link Roo.form.Form}.

params.name: config
params.desc: Configuration options

config.name: listeners
hideLabels
config.desc: True to suppress the display of field labels in this layout (defaults to false)

config.name: hideMode
config.desc:
y)
How this component should hidden. Supported values are
"visibility" (css visibility), "offsets" (negative offset position) and
"display" (css display) - defaults to "display".

config.name: style
config.desc:
A style specification string, e.g. "width:100px", or object in the form {width:"100px"}, or
a function which returns such a specification.

config.name: allowDomMove
config.desc: Whether the component can move the Dom node when rendering (defaults to true).

config.name: labelWidth
config.desc: Fixed width in pixels of all field labels (defaults to undefined)

config.name: labelSeparator
config.desc: The separator to use after field labels (defaults to ':')

config.name: autoCreate
config.desc: A DomHelper element spec used to autocreate the layout (defaults to {tag: 'div', cls: 'x-form-ct'})

config.name: clear
config.desc: True to add a clearing element at the end of this layout, equivalent to CSS clear: both (defaults to true)

config.name: actionMode
config.desc:
which property holds the element that used for  hide() / show() / disable() / enable()
default is 'el' for forms you probably want to set this to fieldEl

config.name: width
config.desc: The fixed width of the column in pixels or CSS value (defaults to "auto")

config.name: height
config.desc: The fixed height of the column in pixels or CSS value (defaults to "auto")

config.name: disableClass
config.desc: CSS class added to the component when it is disabled (defaults to "x-item-disabled").

methods.name: addxtype
methods.desc:
Adds a object form elements (using the xtype property as the factory method.)
Valid xtypes are:  TextField, TextArea .... Button, Layout, FieldSet, Column

methods.name: getId
methods.desc: Returns the id of this component.

methods.name: render
methods.desc: If this is a lazy rendering component, render it to its container element.

params.name: container
params.desc: (optional) The element this component should be rendered into. If it is being applied to existing markup, this should be left off.

methods.name: destroy
methods.desc:
Destroys this component by purging any event listeners, removing the component's element from the DOM,
removing the component from its {@link Roo.Container} (if applicable) and unregistering it from {@link Roo.ComponentMgr}.
